BlackNightmare:

"I'll with ya"said kindly the femme while she touched glenty his 
hand"Soon you will be ok... Are you hungry, Malice?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> "Cold.  I am cold to the core.  And weak, no strength.  Most of 
all, blinded by darkness.  I cannot see.  Stay with me, do not leave 
me alone." the Hunter Killer said, trying to reach out for the voice 
of the femme with him.
> Fear was etched on his face.  He was a completely differant bot 
now, once enjoyed solitude, now afraid to be alone.  But it will 
pass, once he has recovered his former power.
> "Stay with me.  It is dark and I am alone."
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> BlackNightmare arrived where Malice was, she with a kindly smile 
> said "Good morning, Malice... How do you feel?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Hellplague/ Splattercannon/ Malice:
> >  
> > "Very well.  We will need much, his EPS grid will need a lot to 
> fully energize."
> > Hellplague steps out of the room and contacts Splattercannon.
> > "Meet me in the southern annex.  We have a lot of energon to 
> carry."
> > "I will be there." the Silent one said.
> > Hellplague transformed and took off for the southern annex, 
where 
> a large store of energon awaits.
> >  
> > ~Twenty minutes later~
> >  
> > Minutes after Hellplague left, shudders pass though the form of 
he 
> great hunter.  His fingers twitch, arms barely move.  All he feels 
> is cold and blackness... and for the first time in his long life, 
> fear.
> > "... hello?  It's so cold, it drains the life from me.  
Someone... 
> help me..."
> 
>
